about.summary: Functions for multiple knockoff inference using summary statistics, e.g. Z-scores. The knockoff inference is a general procedure for controlling the false discovery rate (FDR) when performing variable selection. This package provides a procedure which performs knockoff inference without ever constructing individual knockoffs (GhostKnockoff). It additionally supports multiple knockoff inference for improved stability and reproducibility. Moreover, it supports meta-analysis of multiple overlapping studies.

Functions for multiple knockoff inference using summary statistics, e.g. Z-scores. The knockoff inference is a general procedure for controlling the false discovery rate (FDR) when performing variable selection. This package provides a procedure which performs knockoff inference without ever constructing individual knockoffs (GhostKnockoff). It additionally supports multiple knockoff inference for improved stability and reproducibility. Moreover, it supports meta-analysis of multiple overlapping studies.

name: r-ghostknockoff
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set version = '0.1.0' %}
{% set posix = 'm2-' if win else '' %}

package:
  name: r-ghostknockoff
  version: {{ version|replace("-", "_") }}

source:
  url:
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/GhostKnockoff_{{ version }}.tar.gz
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/Archive/GhostKnockoff/GhostKnockoff_{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: 32b7355cea68770633838d57695522bbe541bb79f33fc9eaee94f9302672e96e

build:
  number: 4
  noarch: generic
  rpaths:
    - lib/R/lib/
    - lib/

requirements:
  build:
    - {{ posix }}zip               # [win]
    - cross-r-base {{ r_base }}    # [build_platform != target_platform]
  host:
    - r-base
    - r-cvxr
    - r-matrix
    - r-rspectra
    - r-rdsdp
    - r-corpcor
    - r-gtools
    - r-seqminer
  run:
    - r-base
    - r-cvxr
    - r-matrix
    - r-rspectra
    - r-rdsdp
    - r-corpcor
    - r-gtools
    - r-seqminer

test:
  commands:
    - $R -e "library('GhostKnockoff')"           # [not win]
    - "\"%R%\" -e \"library('GhostKnockoff')\""  # [win]

about:
  home: https://CRAN.R-project.org/package=GhostKnockoff
  license: GPL-3.0-only
  summary: Functions for multiple knockoff inference using summary statistics, e.g. Z-scores.
    The knockoff inference is a general procedure for controlling the false discovery
    rate (FDR) when performing variable selection. This package provides a procedure
    which performs knockoff inference without ever constructing individual knockoffs
    (GhostKnockoff). It additionally supports multiple knockoff inference for improved
    stability and reproducibility. Moreover, it supports meta-analysis of multiple overlapping
    studies.
  license_family: GPL3
  license_file:
    - {{ environ["PREFIX"] }}/lib/R/share/licenses/GPL-3

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - conda-forge/r
